thread.title: Top 10 Hotels for the California Fall Wine Harvest [SLIDESHOW]
thread.title_full: Top 10 Hotels for the California Fall Wine Harvest [SLIDESHOW]

author: Rebekah Bell
title: Top 10 Hotels for the California Fall Wine Harvest [SLIDESHOW]
text:
Rebekah Bell AUGUST 10, 2015 
As warm summer days fade to crisp autumn nights, dedicated oenophiles may want to make their way to Northern California to experience the peak of wine-crush season. After touring wineries, tasting the best vintages, and soaking in the fall colors, guests will want to retreat to one of these 10 hotels for a peaceful night’s rest.
